title: peace glyph
content:
the peace symbol turns 50. we're all invited to contribute versions.

[http://www.happybirthdaypeace.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020161247/http:/www.happybirthdaypeace.com/ "http://www.happybirthdaypeace.com/")
author: Ch

comments.content:
Happy birthday indeed!

I don't think anyone has used the CND symbol (I grew up in Aldermaston so I don’t accept the 'peace symbol' tag) as effectively as Ken Garland - [http://www.kengarland.co.uk/KG%20graphic%20design/cnd/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020161247/http:/www.kengarland.co.uk/KG%20graphic%20design/cnd/index.html "http://www.kengarland.co.uk/KG%20graphic%20design/cnd/index.html")
pro-vietnamn'ers called it the chicken foot.
